author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Celcuity Q1 Loss Per Share $0.19
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Celcuity Inc:
* CELCUITY REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.16
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 * CELCUITY-INTERIM RESULTS OF CLINICAL TRIAL IN COLLABORATION WITH NSABP FOUNDATION, GENENTECH EXPECTED IN Q1 OR Q2 2019, INSTEAD OF 2018 END ANTICIPATED EARLIER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
